title: New Cancer Ward Complex for Kandy General Hospital
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Chandana Perera) A new Cancer Ward Complex for Kandy General Hospital will be constructed in January next year, President’s Media Unit announced recently. President Mahinda Rajapaksa has presided over a discussion in detail the project plan at the Temple Trees on the construction of a new ward…
